name: Triax Capital
overview: Triax Capital Advisors, LLC provides financial advisory services. The firm focuses on areas such as financial restructuring including raising capital, negotiation, and M&A advisory; and operational restructuring such as crisis management, business reviews, and preparing financial reports and filings. In addition, it offers forensic accounting and litigation support services including financial statement reviews, providing information to assess solvency of entities, and assisting counsel in formulating causes of action, claims or defenses. Triax Capital, formerly known as Balfour Capital Advisors, LLC, is based in New York, New York.
